name: tm48
effect: Teaches Skill Swap to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Round to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV & III: Skill Swap Gen II: Fire Punch Gen I: Rock Slide)

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user attacks the target with a song. Others can join in the Round to increase the power of the attack.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user attacks the target with a song. Others can join in the Round to increase the power of the attack.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The target is attacked with a powerful beam. The user can’t move on the next turn.
